headline: Why RTX Delivers Growth, Value, and Counteroffense in the Turbulent Trump Era
summary: As an investor focused on defensive high alpha, I’m currently bullish on RTX Corp. (RTX), previously better known as Raytheon. After diving into its Q1 2025 earnings, my conviction in the company’s long-term potential has only grown stronger. Despite macroeconomic headwinds and fresh concerns over new tariffs, RTX continues to deliver results that underscore its unique positioning at the intersection of defense, aerospace, and global security. headline: GE Aerospace Stock: Not A No-Brainer, Still A Buy
